actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-65.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1157) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1986 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Transportation and the Federal Maritime Commission.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1157 (maritime programs funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1157) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1986 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Transportation and the Federal Maritime Commission.
